message: Todd Mulhern is working on a new series for the Science Channel called Underground Science. Its purpose is to travel the country and showcase various inventors, engineers, DIYers and any form of "backyard scientist."  Call him if you'd like to be on it @(212) 813-3657
@psytek I am excited for this show to start! Do we know yet when it is scheduled to air?
@EmtMomma4 not sure, I think it may have even started already.
@psytek Will the backyard science be limited to hardware inventions?  Can web applications/experiments be showcased?
Sounds cool! Let me know what channel it's on too!
I haven't heard much about this in a while, can someone call him up and see what is going on?
